translation.en: [woman 1] A lot of people feel that holiday newsletters are corny and old-fashioned.
translation.zh: 很多人觉得假日简报老土又过时

translation.en: [woman 1] But in our family,
translation.zh: 但在我们家

translation.en: they're a time-honored tradition, so here goes.
translation.zh: 这是历史悠久的传统 所以

translation.en: "Dear friends, family, and fellow Earth dwellers."
translation.zh: “亲爱的朋友 家人和地球上的同胞们

translation.en: "We're back, after a brief one-year hiatus,
translation.zh: 在短暂的一年中断后 我们又来

translation.en: to report on the latest and greatest in the Jennings family."
translation.zh: 告知各位詹宁斯家族最新近况了

translation.en: "Life just seems to fly by,
translation.zh: 人生仿佛飞逝而过

translation.en: but that's what happens when you're having a splendiferous time."
translation.zh: 但当你人生美好顺遂时就会时光飞逝

translation.en: "At only ten years old,
translation.zh: 虽然只有十岁

translation.en: our daughter, Beatrix,
translation.zh: 但我们的女儿碧翠丝

translation.en: became the youngest person ever accepted to Harvard University."
translation.zh: 成为有史以来最年轻的哈佛录取生

translation.en: "As for our oldest son, Daniel,
translation.zh: 而我们的大儿子丹尼尔

translation.en: his work continues helping to avert a humanitarian crisis in Africa,
translation.zh: 他的工作继续帮非洲减缓人道主义危机

translation.en: and building a water purification system
translation.zh: 建立净水系统

translation.en: that'll bring fresh and clean water to thousands."
translation.zh: 为数千人提供新鲜干净的水源

translation.en: -Ugh. -"And my better half, Valentino,
translation.zh: 我的另一半 瓦伦蒂诺 经营着一家非常成功的空手道道场

translation.en: runs a highly-successful karate dojo."
translation.zh: 瓦伦蒂诺 经营着一家非常成功的空手道道场

translation.en: "He's also directing our town's annual Christmas pageant,
translation.zh: 他还是镇上圣诞表演会的导演

translation.en: which is Hadley Falls' biggest event of the year."
translation.zh: 这是哈德利瀑布年度最盛大的活动

translation.en: "And In case you're wondering about little ol' me,
translation.zh: 如果你想知道我的近况

translation.en: well, my hard work finally paid off,
translation.zh: 我的努力终于得到回报

translation.en: and I was able to sell Jennings Aviation this year and retire early."
translation.zh: 今年我得以售出詹宁斯飞行器并提早退休

translation.en: "I'm always searching for new adventures."
translation.zh: 我一直在寻找新的冒险

translation.en: "The latest is fulfilling Daniel's dream to promote green energy
translation.zh: 我的最新项目是实现丹尼尔的梦想推广绿色能源

translation.en: by taking a family trip around the world in a solar-powered hot air balloon."
translation.zh: 乘坐太阳能热气球带全家环游世界”

translation.en: -[music stops suddenly] -[woman 2] Really?
translation.zh: 乘坐太阳能热气球带全家环游世界” 真的假的？现在谁还寄圣诞简报？

translation.en: Who sends Christmas letters anymore?
translation.zh: 真的假的？现在谁还寄圣诞简报？

translation.en: I mean, how much of this can a person take?
translation.zh: 一个人能承受多少？

translation.en: Don't bother. I know the answer.
translation.zh: 别费劲回答了 我知道答案

translation.en: As for me, I would never send one of those letters. Why, you might ask?
translation.zh: 至于我 我绝不会寄出那种信你可能会问为什么？

translation.en: Well, my family's accomplishments are hardly newsworthy.
translation.zh: 我家族的成就根本没什么上报价值

translation.en: This is my youngest, Dora. Cute as a button.
translation.zh: 这是我最小的孩子 朵拉可爱的不得了

translation.en: But thanks to Marvel, she believes she has superpowers.
translation.zh: 但因为漫威 她相信自己有超能力

translation.en: "Super strength"?
translation.zh: 力气大？

translation.en: Okay, we can cross that one off the list. Never mind. Let's get in the car.
translation.zh: 好吧 这项可以划掉了别在意 我们上车吧

translation.en: And do me a favor, give me a heads-up before you try flying again.
translation.zh: 帮我个忙 在你再次尝试飞行之前告诉我一声

translation.en: Okay, Mom.
translation.zh: 好的 妈妈

translation.en: I know everyone thinks their kids are exceptional, but… come on already.
translation.zh: 我知道每个人都觉得自己的孩子很优秀 但别自欺欺人了

translation.en: I nominate Bob for copilot.
translation.zh: 我提名鲍勃当副驾驶他是天生的导航家

translation.en: -He's a born navigator. -[woman 2] And then there's Grant.
translation.zh: 我提名鲍勃当副驾驶他是天生的导航家 还有格兰特

translation.en: -[bang snaps popping] -[woman 2] He thinks he's a ninja warrior.
translation.zh: 他以为自己是忍者战士

translation.en: And his only friend in the world is a stufty named Monkey Bob.
translation.zh: 他在这个世界上唯一的朋友是一只叫猴子鲍勃的娃娃

translation.en: -Do we really have to go to Aunt Stacy's? -They're family. It's Christmas.
translation.zh: -我们非要去史黛西阿姨家吗？-他们是家人 而且这是圣诞节

translation.en: Why can't we go to Jackie's house?
translation.zh: 为什么我们不能去洁姬家？

translation.en: -Who? -Your pal Jackie from this letter.
translation.zh: -谁？-你的朋友洁姬

translation.en: They sound super awesome.
translation.zh: 他们听起来超级棒

translation.en: You are friends, right?
translation.zh: 你们是朋友 对吧？

translation.en: Pfft! I mean, no. Yes, we were.
translation.zh: 不 我们以前是朋友

translation.en: -Sort of. A long time ago. -I wanna fly in her balloon.
translation.zh: -算是吧 很久以前-我想坐她的热气球

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay. Well, let me tell you something about my BFF, Jackie.
translation.zh: 好 我跟你说说我最好的朋友 洁姬

translation.en: I would love nothing more than to show up at her house uninvited
translation.zh: 我最希望能不请自来去她家

translation.en: and to see the actual truth of all her imagined…
translation.zh: 看看她真实的家 对比那些她的想象

translation.en: Forget it.
translation.zh: 无所谓

translation.en: Uh, put Aunt Stacy's new address in here, and don't download any games.
translation.zh: 把史黛西阿姨的新地址输进去不要下载任何游戏

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好主意

translation.en: Hop on in. Okay, kiddo? [woman 2] This is my adorable husband, the dreamer.
translation.zh: -上车 好吗 朵拉？-这是我可爱的丈夫 梦想家

translation.en: Every house he sees for sale,
translation.zh: 他看到所有待售的房子

translation.en: he thinks it's an opportunity to make some big money.
translation.zh: 都认为这是赚大钱的机会

translation.en: -Check this out. -[woman 2] He dreams. I worry.
translation.zh: -看看这个-他做梦 我担心

translation.en: We can't afford to buy that house right now.
translation.zh: 我们现在买不起那栋房子

translation.en: -Let's just dip into the emergency fund. -That would be a swan dive.
translation.zh: -我们动用应急基金吧-那简直是飞蛾扑火

translation.en: It's for emergencies, like losing our jobs, or a flood, or… zombies?
translation.zh: 那笔钱是为了应对紧急情况比如失业 洪水或僵尸？

translation.en: Your Chip Mitt is gonna pay off, babe.
translation.zh: 你的薯片手套会赚到钱的 宝贝

translation.en: It's just taking a little longer than we thought.
translation.zh: 只是比我们想象的要费时间

translation.en: -A little. -What was it John Lennon said?
translation.zh: -就一点-约翰·列侬说过什么？

translation.en: "Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans."
translation.zh: “生活就是当你忙于制定其他计划时发生的事情”

translation.en: [woman 2] As for me, I finally gave up my dream to be a famous inventor.
translation.zh: 而我终于放弃了成为著名发明家的梦想

translation.en: I'm a reliability engineer with StarTech Industries.
translation.zh: （星际工业 测试客厅） 我是星际科技工业的可靠性工程师

translation.en: When stuff you buy goes south, like our flaming vacuum cleaner here,
translation.zh: 当你买的东西坏了比如我们的自然吸尘器

translation.en: which Consumer Weekly nicknamed "The Vacuum of Death,"
translation.zh: 被《消费者周刊》称为“死亡吸尘器”

translation.en: -I'm the one you call to clean up-- Oop! -[igniting]
translation.zh: 我是被叫来处理问题的人

translation.en: [sighs] All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Andiamo.
translation.zh: 我们出发

translation.en: Um, I think Bob just peed in the car.
translation.zh: 我想鲍勃刚在车里尿尿了

translation.en: Gross! What if I have super smell?
translation.zh: 恶心 万一我有超级嗅觉呢？

translation.en: It'll be way, way worse for me. It's gonna be a long drive to my sister's.
translation.zh: -对我来说会更糟-去我姐姐家要开很久的车

translation.en: Yep. All right, the Sanders holiday travel train
translation.zh: 对 好了 桑德斯家庭的旅行列车

translation.en: is finally leaving the station.
translation.zh: 终于要出发了

translation.en: Choo choo!
translation.zh: 滴滴！

translation.en: [woman 2] Only two hours behind schedule. We are improving.
translation.zh: 只晚了两个小时 我们在进步

translation.en: Hit the brakes!
translation.zh: 踩刹车！

translation.en: -Dude! -I just remembered.
translation.zh: -哥们-我刚想起来

translation.en: We forgot to tell Santa where we'll be! What if he sees we're not there
translation.zh: 我们忘了告诉圣诞老人要去哪里万一他看到我们不在家

translation.en: and gives our presents to the kids next door?
translation.zh: 把我们的礼物送给隔壁的孩子呢？

translation.en: First of all, don't ever scream, "Hit the brakes." And second, Santa knows.
translation.zh: 首先 永远不要大喊“踩刹车”其次 圣诞老人知道

translation.en: How do you know he knows?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道他知道？

translation.en: -'Cause I called him. -You actually spoke… to Santa?
translation.zh: -因为我给他打电话了-你和圣诞老人说上话了？

translation.en: The fat man and I are like that, yo!
translation.zh: 我和胖子是这种关系

translation.en: Homie.
translation.zh: 好兄弟

translation.en: Don't do that in public. -Okay! -[festive music playing]
translation.zh: 别在公共场合这么做

translation.en: [man] Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Is that…
translation.zh: 这难道是？

translation.en: Uh, the Jennings Holiday Newsletter. They missed sending it last year.
translation.zh: （圣诞节前五天） 詹宁斯家族假日简报他们去年忘记寄了

translation.en: -I was wondering how they were doing. -Well, that's not gonna tell you anything.
translation.zh: -不知道他们过得如何-这份简报也没法告诉你

translation.en: It's the most absurd thing ever.
translation.zh: 这是我听过最荒谬的事

translation.en: It's a holiday letter. They're always--
translation.zh: 这是节日简报 总会有点…

translation.en: Smug? Boastful?
translation.zh: 自鸣得意？自吹自擂？

translation.en: Overly positive.
translation.zh: 过度乐观

translation.en: I mean, doesn't it bother you that she makes up this preposterous stuff,
translation.zh: 你不觉得奇怪吗她编造这些荒谬的说辞

translation.en: and then she broadcasts it to her "fellow Earth dwellers"?
translation.zh: 还广而告之给“地球同胞们”？

translation.en: [mockingly] Like, "Oh, you're life is amazing."
translation.zh: -想让人感叹“你的生活真美好”-你怎么知道她是编的？

translation.en: -How do you know she's making it up? -That's who she is.
translation.zh: -想让人感叹“你的生活真美好”-你怎么知道她是编的？ 她就是这种人 还记得她说自己最好的朋友是玛丽亚·凯莉吗

translation.en: Do you remember when she said she was best friends with Mariah Carey,
translation.zh: 她就是这种人 还记得她说自己最好的朋友是玛丽亚·凯莉吗

translation.en: and she got her to sing at our graduation,
translation.zh: 她邀请她来我们毕业会上唱歌

translation.en: and then Mariah's tour bus conveniently got a flat?
translation.zh: 然后玛丽亚巡演的车刚好就爆胎了？

translation.en: And she even claimed that you proposed to her three times.
translation.zh: 她还说你向她求过三次婚

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, that is ridiculous. It was only once.
translation.zh: 太荒谬了 只有一次

translation.en: Kidding.
translation.zh: 开玩笑的

translation.en: You're just defending her 'cause when you two dated,
translation.zh: 你为她辩护只是要因为

translation.en: you were in that No Doubt cover band.
translation.zh: 当你在无疑翻唱乐队时 你们约会过

translation.en: -It was not a cover band. -It was called Total Certainty.
translation.zh: -那不是支翻唱乐队-你们叫完全确定

translation.en: -We sang all original songs. -That sounded exactly like No Doubt.
translation.zh: -我们唱的都是原创歌曲-听起来跟无疑乐队一样

translation.en: Okay, look, I'm not defending anyone,
translation.zh: 好吧 我没有辩护谁

translation.en: but just because Jackie embellishes a little does not mean--
translation.zh: 就算洁姬有点夸大事实也不意味

translation.en: Nobody's life is that wonderful, that perfect, that "splendiferous."
translation.zh: 没人的生活那么和谐那么完美 那么”美好顺遂“

translation.en: By, uh… "nobody's life," you mean ours?
translation.zh: 你说谁的生活 是我们的生活吗？

translation.en: -Rob! -Let me know when you wanna switch.
translation.zh: -罗伯-你想交换的时候告诉我

translation.en: [automated voice] In half a mile, take the exit on the right.
translation.zh: 800米后从右侧出口驶出

translation.en: I thought your sister moved closer to us.
translation.zh: 我以为你姐姐搬得离我们更近了

translation.en: -Isn't it almost midnight? -I know. It does seem far.
translation.zh: -快午夜了吧？-是啊 感觉好远

translation.en: Could that be her house?
translation.zh: 那是她家的房子吗？

translation.en: -It sure is pretty. -[Rob] Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: -确实漂亮-你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: Did you see the Santa on the-- It's like a real-life sled.
translation.zh: 你看到圣诞老人了吗…那好像一个真的雪橇

translation.en: Looks like Stacy hit the lottery.
translation.zh: 看来史黛西中了彩票

translation.en: I mean, she said her new house was nicer, but I didn't think it'd be this nicer.
translation.zh: 她有说过她的新房子更好但我没想到会这么好

translation.en: Okay, you guys stay in the car.
translation.zh: 好 你们待在车里

translation.en: I texted to let them know we'd be late. I hope they're still up.
translation.zh: 我发短信告诉他们我们要晚到希望他们还没睡

translation.en: Oh no.
translation.zh: 不会吧

translation.en: -[grunts] Damn it. -[door opens]
translation.zh: 那些家伙

translation.en: Charlotte Sanders?
translation.zh: 夏洛特·桑德斯？

translation.en: Jackie Jennings?
translation.zh: 洁姬·詹宁斯？

translation.en: Oh my God! Robbie, my rocker! Hey.
translation.zh: 天啊 罗比 摇滚歌星 嘿

translation.en: Hey, Jax. [chuckles dryly]
translation.zh: 嘿 洁克丝

translation.en: What on earth are you doing here? I mean, is the band getting back together?
translation.zh: 你们来这里干什么？乐队要重新开始吗？

translation.en: I was gonna ask you the same question. Isn't this my sister Stacy's house?
translation.zh: 我也想问同样的问题这不是我姐姐史黛西的家吗？

translation.en: Uh, no, silly. This is my house.
translation.zh: 不 傻瓜 这里是我家啊

translation.en: Honey, are you sure you put the right address in your phone?
translation.zh: 你确定你手机里的地址是正确的吗？

translation.en: Of course I'm sure. Oh wait, actually, I didn't put it in, I--
translation.zh: 我当然确定等等 其实地址不是我输入的

translation.en: Surprise!
translation.zh: 惊喜！

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Mom.
translation.zh: 妈妈 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Oh wow. He's stealthy. I'm guessing he's one of yours?
translation.zh: 哇 他好神出鬼没我猜他是你的孩子？

translation.en: Not for long.
translation.zh: 很快就不是了

translation.en: Grant Sanders, you have no idea how much trouble you and that monkey are in.
translation.zh: 格兰特·桑德斯你不知道你和那只猴子有多大麻烦

translation.en: But you said there was nothing you would love more than to show up at Jackie's house uninvited--
translation.zh: 你说没什么比不请自来去洁姬家更好

translation.en: -Oh, that's enough. -[Jackie] You said that?
translation.zh: -别说了-你这么说过吗？

translation.en: Uh, technically, I may have.
translation.zh: 严格来说 我可能说过

translation.en: That is so sweet, Char.
translation.zh: 太贴心了 小夏

translation.en: Listen, I have been putting "stop by anytime" on our newsletter for years,
translation.zh: 听着 多年来我一直在简报上写“欢迎随时来”

translation.en: and nobody has ever taken us up on the offer.
translation.zh: 但从没有人接受这个邀请

translation.en: Val and I actually have a bet going,
translation.zh: 我和瓦尔其实还打赌了

translation.en: and what I just won is gonna put us on Santa's "very naughty" list.
translation.zh: 而我刚赢的奖品会让圣诞老人把我归为“超级调皮”的一类

translation.en: -[whispers] If you know what I mean. -I'll try to imagine.
translation.zh: 如果你懂我的意思 我会试着想象一下

translation.en: -[Jackie laughs] -This is so awkward, um… Oh, I am so sorry for waking you up.
translation.zh: 太尴尬了 很抱歉吵醒你

translation.en: I'm sorry for the mix-up, and, um, well, have a good night.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉搞错了 那晚安

translation.en: Wait a minute. Where do you think you're going, young lady?
translation.zh: 等等 你以为自己要去哪里 小姐？

translation.en: Oh, well, to my sister's.
translation.zh: 去我姐姐家

translation.en: At this hour? I don't think so.
translation.zh: 都这个时间了？不行

translation.en: Grab your bags. There is plenty of room here at the inn.
translation.zh: 拿上你们的行李 我家有足够的房间

translation.en: Oh, no, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Are we here? I gotta pee super badly.
translation.zh: 我们到了吗？我好想尿尿

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Me three.
translation.zh: 还有我

translation.en: Okay. Well, we're gonna leave first thing in the morning.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们明天一早就要离开

translation.en: Of course! After breakfast. You have to meet the fam. Okay, come on.
translation.zh: 当然 不过得是早餐后你必须见见我家人 进来吧

translation.en: Whoa, this place is like Wayne Manor.
translation.zh: 这个地方就像韦恩庄园

translation.en: I hope you grounded him for life!
translation.zh: 我希望你让他终生禁足

translation.en: He's claiming it was all Monkey Bob's idea,
translation.zh: 他坚称这是猴子鲍勃的主意

translation.en: who, by the way, has his own room, and it's bigger than our entire apartment.
translation.zh: 对了 它还有自己的房间比我们整间公寓都大

translation.en: -I guess he needs his space. -[knock on door]
translation.zh: 我想它需要自己的空间

translation.en: Hey. I remember Robbie's toes get cold at night.
translation.zh: 嘿 我记得罗比的脚趾在晚上会变冷

translation.en: Now, I am right next door.
translation.zh: 我就在隔壁

translation.en: If you guys need anything, you just knock, okay?
translation.zh: 如果你们需要什么就敲门 好吗？

translation.en: Oh, and, Robbie, look what I found.
translation.zh: 还有罗比 看看我找到了什么

translation.en: This is when we won the Battle of the Bands.
translation.zh: 这是我们赢得乐队之战时的照片

translation.en: -We killed it that night! -[laughs] What?
translation.zh: -我们那晚杀疯了-什么？

translation.en: -[Jackie] Remember? -Wow! Well… Yeah, that was a long time ago.
translation.zh: -还记得吗？-当然 很久以前的事了

translation.en: Ah! It feels like yesterday.
translation.zh: 感觉就像昨天一样

translation.en: Okay. So cute.
translation.zh: 放这里 非常可爱

translation.en: Good night, Robbie.
translation.zh: 晚安 罗比

translation.en: Good night, Jax.
translation.zh: 晚安 洁克丝

translation.en: -[door closes] -Oh my God. "Jax. Robbie."
translation.zh: 天啊 “洁克丝 罗比”你们有爱称吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] You guys had pet names? I mean, how serious were you?
translation.zh: 天啊 “洁克丝 罗比”你们有爱称吗？ 你们那会有多认真？我以为你们只是差不多约会了一阵？

translation.en: I thought you just kinda sorta dated?
translation.zh: 你们那会有多认真？我以为你们只是差不多约会了一阵？

translation.en: Well, we sorta did.
translation.zh: 差不多吧

translation.en: But Jax-- Jackie-- Jacqueline was, uh, you know,
translation.zh: 但洁克丝 洁姬 洁奎琳

translation.en: she was my first college girlfriend.
translation.zh: 她是我的第一个大学女友

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: So, what did you see in her, anyway?
translation.zh: 那你看中她什么了？

translation.en: Oh God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: I was young and sheltered, and she was, like,
translation.zh: 我当时年轻 受到保护 而她却

translation.en: smart, and crazy, and spontaneous. -I mean, she was always up for anything. -Huh.
translation.zh: 聪明疯狂又随性她总是愿意尝试新事物

translation.en: Well, I'm spontaneous. I'm always up for anything.
translation.zh: 我也很随性 我也愿意尝试新事物

translation.en: You are?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: -But here? -Sure.
translation.zh: -在这里吗？-当然

translation.en: -Now? -Why not?
translation.zh: -现在？-有何不可？

translation.en: I don't trust your motives.
translation.zh: 我不相信你的动机

translation.en: -What does that mean? -It's suspicious behavior, that's all.
translation.zh: -什么意思？-感觉你很可疑 仅此而已

translation.en: Got it.
translation.zh: 知道了

translation.en: Okay. [grunts softly]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Night, Miss Spontaneous.
translation.zh: 晚安 随性小姐

translation.en: Guess she won the bet.
translation.zh: 我猜她打赌赢了

translation.en: Looks better this way.
translation.zh: 这样比较好看

translation.en: What-- Really, Charlotte?
translation.zh: 什么？真的吗 夏洛特？

translation.en: No, no, you don't understand. I didn't do anything. It fell.
translation.zh: 不 你不明白我什么都没做 它掉下来了

translation.en: [Rob] Yeah.
translation.zh: 行吧

translation.en: There you are, buddy. Sorry, Mom.
translation.zh: 你在这呢 孩子 真抱歉 妈妈

translation.en: Sometimes Bob likes to watch you sleep.
translation.zh: 有时候鲍勃喜欢看你睡觉

translation.en: -Um, where is everybody? -Kitchen.
translation.zh: -大家都在哪里？-厨房

translation.en: Is it okay if we try to find the car after breakfast?
translation.zh: 我们吃完早饭再去找车 可以吗？

translation.en: Sure. I mean, wait. What do you mean, "find the car"?
translation.zh: 当然 等等 什么叫“找车”？

translation.en: Don't bother, Nanook.
translation.zh: 别费劲了 爱斯基摩人

translation.en: What do you mean? We have to get to my sister's.
translation.zh: 什么意思？我们得去我姐姐家

translation.en: I already spoke to Stacy.
translation.zh: 我已经跟史黛西谈过了

translation.en: They got hit worse than us. Totally snowed in.
translation.zh: 他们那边雪比我们还大 全都困住了

translation.en: We'll try to see her for New Year's.
translation.zh: 我们新年的时候再过去

translation.en: Come inside. Jackie and Val whipped up an incredible breakfast.
translation.zh: 进来 洁姬和瓦尔准备了美味的早餐

translation.en: Okay. But then we're going home! On skis, chains, sled dogs, whatever.
translation.zh: 好吧 但之后我们要用滑雪板链条 雪橇犬 无论什么工具都得回家

translation.en: By the way, try not to stare.
translation.zh: 对了 尽量别盯着看

translation.en: Stare? Why would I--
translation.zh: 盯着看？我为什么

translation.en: Charlotte Sanders. It's nice to finally meet you.
translation.zh: 夏洛特·桑德斯 很高兴终于见到你

translation.en: I'm Valentino Miguel Garcia Jennings.
translation.zh: 我是瓦伦蒂诺·米格尔·加西亚·詹宁斯

translation.en: Freshly squeezed.
translation.zh: 鲜榨果汁

translation.en: -[in Spanish] No good? -Yes.
translation.zh: -不好吗？-很好

translation.en: [in English] Chest I ever ha-- I mean, it's the best. The best I ever had.
translation.zh: 我喝过最好的胸部 不 我是说果汁

translation.en: I am so excited to talk to you about your dissertation.
translation.zh: 我很高兴能和你谈谈你的论文

translation.en: [Charlotte] You've read my dissertation?
translation.zh: 你读过我的论文了吗？

translation.en: A bedtime story for our daughter, Beatrix. We both found it… fascinating.
translation.zh: 是我们女儿碧翠丝的睡前故事我们都觉得很有趣

translation.en: Ah! Honey, this is Beatrix.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 这是碧翠丝

translation.en: I found a few calculation errors in your formula, by the way.
translation.zh: 对了 我在你的公式里发现了一些计算错误

translation.en: Sweetheart, what did we tell you?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我们怎么跟你说的？

translation.en: -Don't correct the guest. -Mm-hmm. She's our little genius.
translation.zh: -别纠正客人-她是我们家的小天才

translation.en: Cute. But there were no errors.
translation.zh: 可爱 但我的论文没有错误

translation.en: [Jackie] Pancakes are ready. First up, Dora.
translation.zh: 煎饼做好了 首先是朵拉

translation.en: Here you are, sweetie.
translation.zh: 给你 亲爱的

translation.en: Look, Mom! Aunt Jackie made pancake shapes.
translation.zh: 快看 妈妈 洁姬阿姨做了煎饼的形状

translation.en: Wow, pancake shapes, just like I make. No. These look like real things.
translation.zh: -哇 煎饼的形状 跟我做的一样-不 这些看起来像真的

translation.en: -And mine look like what? -Not Super Dora.
translation.zh: -那我做的呢？-不像超人朵拉

translation.en: Aunt Jackie, Uncle Val, Bob would like to thank you for your generous hospitality.
translation.zh: 洁姬阿姨 瓦尔叔叔鲍勃感谢你们的盛情款待

translation.en: He's not used to being treated so… civilly.
translation.zh: 他不习惯被这么客气地对待

translation.en: Well, man or a monkey, a guest is a guest.
translation.zh: 不管是人还是猴子 客人就是客人

translation.en: For my king of rock and roll.
translation.zh: 给我的摇滚之王

translation.en: What? That's amazing. It's a crown. It's a crown.
translation.zh: 什么？太棒了 是皇冠

translation.en: Mom, what was all that banging last night?
translation.zh: 妈 昨晚家里叮叮当当在干什么？

translation.en: Oh! That was just your Aunt Jackie and Uncle Val moving some furniture.
translation.zh: 那只是你洁姬阿姨和瓦尔叔叔在搬家具

translation.en: -[Val] Mmm. -It's an adult thing.
translation.zh: 这是大人的事

translation.en: You guys don't move furniture like that at night.
translation.zh: 你们晚上可没有这样搬家具

translation.en: We, um, move furniture all the time.
translation.zh: 我们经常搬家具

translation.en: We just do it quietly.
translation.zh: 只是悄悄地搬

translation.en: But that doesn't mean it's not getting moved
translation.zh: 但这并不意味着家具没有搬

translation.en: and getting moved real well.
translation.zh: 或者没有搬到位

translation.en: The nucleus of an atom.
translation.zh: 原子核

translation.en: For the girl who single-handedly got me through Physics 101.
translation.zh: 给这位单枪匹马让我通过物理基础课的女孩

translation.en: [chuckles] Listen, your mother was the most brilliant student in college.
translation.zh: 听着 你们妈妈当年是大学里最优秀的学生

translation.en: Without her as my tutor, I never would have graduated.
translation.zh: 没有她辅导我 我都没法毕业

translation.en: Oh, which reminds me, Robbie, did you ask her yet?
translation.zh: 我想起来了 罗比 你问过她了吗？

translation.en: Ask me what?
translation.zh: 问我什么？

translation.en: Oh, well, um…
translation.zh: 这个嘛

translation.en: Jaqueline, uh, invited us to stay for Christmas.
translation.zh: 洁奎琳请我们留下来过圣诞节

translation.en: Yes! It will be so great, Char.
translation.zh: 对 肯定会很棒的 小夏

translation.en: I mean, we can catch up and have us some serious girl time.
translation.zh: 我们可以叙叙旧 享受女生之夜

translation.en: It's been way too long.
translation.zh: 我们太久没见面了

translation.en: That is incredibly generous, but we could not possibly--
translation.zh: 这个提议很慷慨 但我们不能…

translation.en: Christmas with Jackie is a life-altering experience.
translation.zh: 和洁姬一起过圣诞是场改变人生的经历

translation.en: Please, Mom.
translation.zh: 求求你了 妈

translation.en: Me and Bob wanna stay. Please?
translation.zh: 我和鲍勃想留下来 拜托了？

translation.en: [laughs] I mean, um… It's up to your dad. Rob?
translation.zh: 这取决于你爸爸 罗伯？

translation.en: Well, then it's settled. 'Cause Robbie already said yes.
translation.zh: 那就这么定了 因为罗比已经同意了

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -[bell ringing] -Do we all hear that?
translation.zh: 大家都听见了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah! I heard it! It's-- -[Dora] I hear bells.
translation.zh: -我听到了-我听到铃声了

translation.en: -[Dora] Sleigh bells! -I… I hear it.
translation.zh: -雪橇铃！-我听到了

translation.en: [Grant] Yeah. [imitating Bob] I heard it too. I heard it.
translation.zh: -对-我也听到了 我听到了

translation.en: Are there letters in the stockings? How do you like that?
translation.zh: 袜子里有信吗？这太棒了吧？

translation.en: Ooh! This one is addressed to Theodora Sanders.
translation.zh: 这封信是写给茜奥朵拉·桑德斯的

translation.en: Is that what Dora is short for? I thought it was "adorable."
translation.zh: 朵拉是这个名字的缩写吗？我还以为是可爱的缩写

translation.en: And, ooh, Grant!
translation.zh: 还有格兰特

translation.en: -Really? -[Jackie] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: And there's another one to a Bob Sanders. Could that be Monkey Bob?
translation.zh: 还有一封信给鲍勃·桑德斯会不会是猴子鲍勃？

translation.en: [chuckling] I wonder who they're from?
translation.zh: 不知道是谁送的

translation.en: [Grant] It's from Santa!
translation.zh: 这是圣诞老人送的

translation.en: It says, "Dear Honorable Ninja Grant."
translation.zh: 上面写着“尊敬的忍者格兰特”

translation.en: But the flue was closed.
translation.zh: 但烟道关闭了

translation.en: "I've been informed you'll be staying with the super cool Jennings family this Christmas."
translation.zh: “我听说今年圣诞节你会住在超级酷的詹宁斯家

translation.en: "I will deliver your presents to their home in Hadley Falls."
translation.zh: 我会把你的礼物送到他们在哈德利瀑布的家

translation.en: "Merry Christmas. Santa Claus."
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 圣诞老人”

translation.en: Best Christmas ever.
translation.zh: 这是最棒的圣诞节

translation.en: How could you say yes? Now we are trapped.
translation.zh: 你怎么能同意？现在我们被困住了

translation.en: This isn't the Donner Pass. And I didn't say yes.
translation.zh: 这里不是险峻唐纳山口我也没有同意

translation.en: I just said I was fine with it if you were.
translation.zh: 我只是说如果你愿意 我也无所谓

translation.en: We still have three days till Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 离平安夜还有三天

translation.en: We leave as soon as the weather clears, we can get home in time for--
translation.zh: 等天气转晴 我们就能及时回家

translation.en: What? For what? -What is wrong with Christmas here? -Ugh.
translation.zh: 什么？回去干什么？在这里过圣诞节有什么问题？

translation.en: Is the real reason you don't wanna stay what I think it is?
translation.zh: 你不想留下来的真正原因是我想的那样吗？

translation.en: You mean about you and Jackie? Pfft! Don't be ridiculous.
translation.zh: 你是说你和洁姬？别开玩笑了

translation.en: Are you sure?
translation.zh: 你确定吗？

translation.en: 'Cause, look, I would totally understand if--
translation.zh: 因为如果是的话 我完全理解

translation.en: I'm positive. I mean, I'm not threatened by Jackie.
translation.zh: 确定 我没有受到洁姬的威胁

translation.en: Okay. All right. I was just being sensitive to the situation.
translation.zh: 好吧 我只是想慎重处理这个情况

translation.en: -There's no need. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 没必要

translation.en: So if it's not about that, then what is it?
translation.zh: 如果不是那个原因 那是什么？

translation.en: Is this about the letter?
translation.zh: 和简报有关吗？

translation.en: -[Charlotte] Uh, what letter? -Come on.
translation.zh: -什么简报？-别装傻了

translation.en: You thought it was BS, and now that we know it isn't--
translation.zh: 你以为她是瞎编 现在我们知道不是

translation.en: We do not know that it isn't BS.
translation.zh: 我们不知道这是不是瞎编

translation.en: Babe, have you had a look around? I mean… besides ogling Valentino.
translation.zh: 宝贝 你看过这个家了吗？除了跟瓦伦蒂诺抛媚眼之外

translation.en: -[laughs] I was not ogling! -Okay. Sure.
translation.zh: -我没有抛媚眼-好 你没有

translation.en: "Chest I ever had"? [chuckles] -Real smooth, Charlotte. -[groans]
translation.zh: “我喝过最好的胸部”？表现真自然 夏洛特

translation.en: I was flustered. Like-- -But you are way hotter than him. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 我是有点慌张 但你比他性感多了

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Ugh. I had taken a look around. And something is off here. I can't put my finger on it.
translation.zh: 我看了这个家 总感觉有点不对劲但我说不上来

translation.en: But did you see how fast she came up with those Santa letters?
translation.zh: 不过你看到她在短时间内就写了圣诞老人的来信吗？

translation.en: And what about, like, her other kid who's not here, Daniel?
translation.zh: 然后她的另一个孩子丹尼尔呢？

translation.en: You read the newsletter. -He's in, uh, Kosovo or somewhere. -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 你看了简报 他在科索沃什么的

translation.en: You know, look, I know it's kind of spontaneous and crazy,
translation.zh: 听着 我知道这有点随性和疯狂

translation.en: but they're really nice people.
translation.zh: 但他们真的是好人

translation.en: Maybe you can just fake having a good time.
translation.zh: 也许你可以假装玩得很开心

translation.en: -Pretend we're visiting my mother. -What did you just say?
translation.zh: -就当我们是去探望我母亲-你刚刚说什么？

translation.en: Uh, maybe you can just fake having a good time.
translation.zh: 也许你可以假装玩得很开心

translation.en: -You're right. -I am?
translation.zh: -你说得对-真的？

translation.en: Let's be spontaneous.
translation.zh: 我们都随性点吧

translation.en: Okay, so maybe that's true. Doesn't mean everything else is.
translation.zh: 好吧 也许这个是真的不代表其他事也是

translation.en: So, you're the Harvard girl.
translation.zh: 你就是哈佛女孩

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Check.
translation.zh: 将军

translation.en: -[dramatic note plays] -Checkmate!
translation.zh: 将死

translation.en: [Charlotte] I can admit the kid's good.
translation.zh: 我承认这孩子很优秀

translation.en: Fine. Whatever.
translation.zh: 好吧 随便吧

translation.en: Mariah Carey?
translation.zh: 玛丽亚·凯莉？

translation.en: Stamps.
translation.zh: 出入境记录

translation.en: Good for them.
translation.zh: 真不错

translation.en: -Ms. Sanders? -Huh?
translation.zh: 桑德斯女士？

translation.en: -Grant mentioned you work for StarTech. -Oh! Yeah, I do.
translation.zh: -格兰特提到你为星际科技工作-是的 没错

translation.en: I dunno if you have any company shares, but hedge fund superstar Ken Griffin
translation.zh: 我不知道你有没有持有公司股份但对冲基金的超级明星

translation.en: over at Citadel is shorting the stock.
translation.zh: 城堡投资的肯·格里芬在做空你们的股票

translation.en: You might wanna get out while you can.
translation.zh: 你最好趁现在赶紧抛售

translation.en: You're so cute!
translation.zh: 你真可爱

translation.en: Are you patronizing me?
translation.zh: 你是在糊弄我吗？

translation.en: Me? No.
translation.zh: 我吗？没有

translation.en: Point is, I may be small in stature, Ms. Sanders, but I am tall in intellect.
translation.zh: 重点是 我虽然身材矮小桑德斯女士 但我的智力很高

translation.en: -Beatrix, don't intimidate the guests! -She wasn't intimidating me.
translation.zh: -碧翠丝 别吓唬客人-她没有吓到我

translation.en: -Mind if we take your car? -Our car? But we're snowbound.
translation.zh: -介意我们坐你的车吗？-我们的车？但我们被大雪困住了

translation.en: See? Were snowbound.
translation.zh: 瞧？是之前被雪困住了

translation.en: Driveway is heated, melts in hours.
translation.zh: 车道加热后几小时雪就会融化

translation.en: And they are rock stars at plowing the roads around here.
translation.zh: 而且这是这片地区的道路铲雪高手

translation.en: Come on. Let's get us a tree. [exclaims]
translation.zh: 来吧 我们去弄一棵树吧

translation.en: Ooh! Nice, firm needles.
translation.zh: 很紧致的松针

translation.en: -[Val] Oh yeah. That's a nice one, baby. -[Jackie] Mm-hmm!
translation.zh: 对 这棵树真不错

translation.en: Sturdy trunk.
translation.zh: 结实的树干

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 还行吧

translation.en: -Oh. Sticky. -[Rob] Yeah, love it. Sturdy. Firm.
translation.zh: -我喜欢 结实紧致-很黏

translation.en: Isn't this one, I don't know, kind of ginormous?
translation.zh: 这棵树是不是有点太大了？

translation.en: -Well, Val is hugely festive. -Oof!
translation.zh: 瓦尔喜欢喜庆的节日气氛

translation.en: -[Jackie chuckling] -You inspire me, mi amor.
translation.zh: 是你启发了我 亲爱的

translation.en: -Okay, okay, okay! -[both chuckling]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -Baby, not at the tree lot. -Well…
translation.zh: -宝贝 别在圣诞树商场发情-好吧

translation.en: -Inspiration? Inspiration? -[Rob] Charlotte!
translation.zh: -我们鼓励了他们吗？-夏洛特

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Can you just-- Wait. Hold on, hold on, hold on.
translation.zh: 你能不能 等等

translation.en: It's a little sap.
translation.zh: 只是一些汁液

translation.en: From the tree.
translation.zh: 树上的

translation.en: -[Charlotte] Are you okay? -[man laughs] Ho-ho-ho!
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: -[Grant] Santa! -Well, hello there, children.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人！ 你好 孩子们 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 你好 孩子们 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Thanks for sending the letters.
translation.zh: 谢谢你寄信给我们

translation.en: Letters. Letters, uh…
translation.zh: 信

translation.en: Mmm. Oh, yes, of course! Right. The letters. You're very welcome.
translation.zh: 当然了 对 那些信 不客气

translation.en: We were pleasantly surprised to find them under our pillows this morning.
translation.zh: 今天早上在枕头底下发现时我们很惊喜

translation.en: Splendid!
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: I'm glad they arrived safe and sound. Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 我很高兴信件平安抵达 圣诞快乐

translation.en: The letter wasn't under my pillow.
translation.zh: 信不在我的枕头底下

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Ooh! What's this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: Oh, it's nothing.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: That's a Chip Mitt. It's one of Charlotte's brilliant inventions.
translation.zh: 那是薯片手套是夏洛特的绝妙发明之一

translation.en: Oh, right! Back in college, you used to come up with all the cool gadgets.
translation.zh: 没错 上大学时你总是会做超酷的小玩意

translation.en: What does this one do?
translation.zh: 这个有什么用？

translation.en: It's, um… It's a glove that uses a reverse static charge to repel crumbs.
translation.zh: 这是一种利用反向静电不沾零食碎屑的手套

translation.en: Why would you need a glove to repel crumbs?
translation.zh: 为什么需要手套来排斥零食碎屑？

translation.en: Well, it's for when you're eating snacks… Well, never mind. [laughs]
translation.zh: 这是吃零食的时候用的 算了

translation.en: I mean, it's, um… Never mind.
translation.zh: 我是说 还是算了

translation.en: Well, you know, Daniel always wanted to be an inventor.
translation.zh: 丹尼尔一直想成为发明家

translation.en: Always hoping to change the world.
translation.zh: 希望能改变世界

translation.en: [Charlotte laughs] Well, it's a Chip Mitt. It's not gonna end world hunger.
translation.zh: 这只是薯片手套 没法解决全球饥荒

translation.en: Speaking of which, we read about what Daniel's been up to, and you must be so proud.
translation.zh: 说到这个 我们看到丹尼尔在做的事你一定很骄傲

translation.en: [exhales] He's an inspiration.
translation.zh: 他非常激励人心

translation.en: I wish he was here.
translation.zh: 真希望他在这里

translation.en: Anyway, everything comes with a purpose, Charlotte.
translation.zh: 不管怎样 凡事都有目的 夏洛特

translation.en: Chip Mitt included.
translation.zh: 包括薯片手套

translation.en: And when God gives you a gift, the best "thank you" is to use it.
translation.zh: 当上帝给你天赋最好的“感谢”就是使用它

translation.en: -I love that. -I love you, baby.

translation.zh: 我知道生活没有如你所愿

translation.en: And maybe you're a little embarrassed about where you are, where we are.
translation.zh: 也许你对你的生活我们的近况感到丢脸

translation.en: But I'm not.
translation.zh: 但我不是

translation.en: Actually…
translation.zh: 其实

translation.en: I'm proud.
translation.zh: 我很骄傲

translation.en: Well, so am I.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Sure have an interesting way of showing it.
translation.zh: 你表现的方式还真奇怪

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey, um…
translation.zh: -嗨-嗨

translation.en: So the car's all packed, and I just wanted to apologize for today,
translation.zh: 车都装好了 我只想为今天的事道歉

translation.en: and for everything, and just say thank you
translation.zh: 所有的事 还有谢谢你

translation.en: for your incredible hospitality, and just say how sorry I am that--
translation.zh: 热情款待我们 以及我非常抱歉

translation.en: -You're leaving? -Rob and I thought it would be best.
translation.zh: -你要走了吗？-罗伯和我觉得这样比较好

translation.en: So we're not gonna spend Christmas together.
translation.zh: 所以我们不会 一起过圣诞节

translation.en: Well, I can't imagine spending the holidays together after what happened.
translation.zh: 我无法想象在发生那件事后还能一起过节

translation.en: I mean, what I did was unforgivable.
translation.zh: 我的所作所为不可原谅

translation.en: But, Charlotte, everybody makes mistakes.
translation.zh: 但是夏洛特 每个人都会犯错

translation.en: That's why they put erasers at the end of pencils.
translation.zh: 所以橡皮放在铅笔的末端

translation.en: But, I mean, that dollhouse, it must have taken you weeks to build.
translation.zh: 但那个玩具屋你一定花了好几周才盖好

translation.en: Um, months. But it was a thing, Charlotte, not a human being.
translation.zh: 是好几个月 可那是个东西夏洛特 不是人

translation.en: It's over. Forgotten.
translation.zh: 事情过去了 忘记吧 好吗？

translation.en: Who was it that said, "To forget is to forgive"? I don't know.
translation.zh: 是谁说的“忘记就是原谅”？我不知道

translation.en: I just… I just don't want you to leave.
translation.zh: 我只是不想让你离开

translation.en: -[Jackie] We are friends. -I mean, we were friends.
translation.zh: -我们是朋友-我们曾经是朋友

translation.en: No, we are friends.
translation.zh: 不 我们现在也是朋友

translation.en: -I want you to stay. -[Charlotte sniffles]
translation.zh: 我希望你留下

translation.en: Will you?
translation.zh: 你愿意吗？

translation.en: -We will. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我们会的-好

translation.en: -You better stay. -[laughing] Thank you.
translation.zh: -你最好留下来-谢谢

translation.en: Jackie, um, I'm wondering,
translation.zh: 洁姬 我在想

translation.en: do you have any more of those, um…
translation.zh: 你还有没有那些…

translation.en: Any more…
translation.zh: 哪些？

translation.en: The letters?
translation.zh: 那些信？

translation.en: -Things change. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -事情变了-对

translation.en: Life's what happens when you're busy making plans.
translation.zh: 生活就是当你忙于制定其他计划时发生的事情

translation.en: Yeah, but I gotta admit, that monkey kinda creeps me out.
translation.zh: 对 但我得承认那只猴子让我有点毛骨悚然

translation.en: [laughs] I know, right?
translation.zh: 是吧？

translation.en: I mean… [squeals]
translation.zh: 我是说

translation.en: "This year, Charlotte took a job with StarTech Industries."
translation.zh: “夏洛特拿下了星际科技工业的工作”

translation.en: "She calls it 'a placeholder.'"
translation.zh: “她称之为占位符”

translation.en: That was the plan.
translation.zh: 计划是这样的

translation.en: I always thought someday things would work out.
translation.zh: 我一直以为有一天一切都会如我们所愿

translation.en: And we'd shout from the rooftops, "Look at us! We finally made it."
translation.zh: 我们会在屋顶上大喊“看看我们 我们终于成功了

translation.en: I know what you mean. But the problem is, Char,
translation.zh: 我懂你的意思 但问题是 小夏

translation.en: things won't happen unless you believe they can.
translation.zh: 除非你相信 否则事情不会发生

translation.en: Maybe it's time for a swan dive.
translation.zh: 或许现在该来一次飞蛾扑火了

translation.en: -Rob's dream house? -A Christmas surprise.
translation.zh: -罗伯的梦想之家吗？-圣诞惊喜

translation.en: -What do you think? -That's what I'm talking about!
translation.zh: -你觉得如何？-这样才对

translation.en: Yes, you should do it.
translation.zh: 对 你应该这么做

translation.en: ♪ It's all the little things ♪
translation.zh: （圣诞节前两天）

translation.en: I spoke with our mortgage arm in Arizona,
translation.zh: 我问了贷款经理我们在亚利桑那州的浮动利率

translation.en: and based on your credit score,
translation.zh: 根据你的信用等级

translation.en: we'd be willing to do 4.4%.
translation.zh: 我们愿意提供4.4%的浮动利率

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得呢？

translation.en: I think he should be ashamed of himself.
translation.zh: 我觉得他应该为自己感到羞耻

translation.en: Existing home sales in that area are down 14%.
translation.zh: 该地区的现房销售量下降了14%

translation.en: That's the slowest fourth quarter in a decade.
translation.zh: 这是十年来销售额最差的第四季度

translation.en: And have you taken a look at your bank's 10-Q recently?
translation.zh: 你最近看过你们银行的10Q报告吗？

translation.en: It's pathetic!
translation.zh: 非常不堪 如果你的客户们知道

translation.en: How do you think your customers would feel if they knew that this institution
translation.zh: 非常不堪 如果你的客户们知道 这家机构濒临破产 他们会怎么想？

translation.en: was on the verge of insolvency?
translation.zh: 这家机构濒临破产 他们会怎么想？

translation.en: [laughs nervously] I'm sorry, but their credit, it's-- Above your requirement threshold.
translation.zh: -抱歉 但他们的信用-超过你们的要求门槛

translation.en: -[table thumps] -Come on, Mom, Ms. Sanders. We can do better elsewhere.
translation.zh: 拜托 妈妈 桑德斯女士我们可以在其他地方拿到更好的利率

translation.en: -[Jackie] Just keep walking. -[man] Wait!
translation.zh: -继续走-等等！

translation.en: How does 4.2 sound?
translation.zh: 4.2听起来怎么样？

translation.en: -Keep walking. -Three-nine.
-Stay strong. -[man] Three-point-two…
fixed!
translation.zh: 固定利率

translation.en: See? Was that so hard?
translation.zh: 瞧 有那么难吗？

translation.en: Now let's make it an even three.
translation.zh: 不如求个整 3%吧

translation.en: [sighs] Okay, 3.1 will do.
translation.zh: 好吧 3.1就行

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: So where'd you run off to today?
translation.zh: 你今天去哪里了？

translation.en: Oh, I can't tell you. It's part of your Christmas surprise.
translation.zh: 我不能告诉你这是给你的圣诞惊喜的一部分

translation.en: Not sure I can handle any more surprises. It's a good one. I promise.
translation.zh: -我不确定自己能承受更多惊喜-是好的惊喜 我保证

translation.en: -Tell me about it. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -告诉我真相-对

translation.en: Well… no worries.
translation.zh: 别担心

translation.en: -Seriously? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-对

translation.en: Yeah. First thing we need to see is, uh, what, if anything, is still intact.
translation.zh: 对 我们首先要看是否有完好无损的部件

translation.en: The structural elements are good, so we only have to replace the flooring
translation.zh: 结构支撑部分完好所以我们只需要更换

translation.en: and the roof.
translation.zh: 地板和屋顶

translation.en: Once that's done, it's just a matter of patching up the damaged walls,
translation.zh: 完成后 只需要修补受损的墙壁

translation.en: framing, and applying the finishes.
translation.zh: 结构和收尾工作

translation.en: So it's salvageable?
translation.zh: 所以还可以挽救吗？

translation.en: Everything is salvageable.
translation.zh: 一切都可以挽救

translation.en: You sure?
translation.zh: 你确定吗？

translation.en: As long as it has a solid foundation.
translation.zh: 只要有扎实的基础

translation.en: Do we have--
translation.zh: 那我们有吗？

translation.en: I think we do.
translation.zh: 我想我们有

translation.en: -But-- -What?
translation.zh: -但是…-什么？

translation.en: Well, the furniture…
translation.zh: 那家具

translation.en: [Charlotte] Yeah?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Let's just say, um… Might need a little more moving.
translation.zh: 这么说吧 家具可能需要搬动一下

translation.en: Definitely.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Each pin represents a sighting of Santa in the tristate area.
translation.zh: 每个大头针代表在三州地区圣诞老人的目击情报

translation.en: [sighs] Malls, Christmas events, et cetera.
translation.zh: 商场 圣诞活动等等

translation.en: They can't all be the real Santa, if the real one exists.
translation.zh: 如果真有圣诞老人他们不可能都是真正的圣诞老人

translation.en: -Bob thinks they're his helpers. -[sighs] It would dilute his brand.
translation.zh: -鲍勃认为他们是他的帮手-这会冲淡他的品牌形象

translation.en: Any luck on your end?
translation.zh: 你有什么发现吗？

translation.en: I searched through my mom's call log,
translation.zh: 我翻遍了我妈妈的通话记录

translation.en: but I couldn't find any calls or texts from a Santa or a Claus.
translation.zh: 但没发现任何来自圣诞或老人的电话或短信

translation.en: Okay, on three. One, two, three!
translation.zh: 好的 数三下 （平安夜） 一二三！

translation.en: -[Beatrix] It's Abuela's dollhouse! -[Grant] Oh, wow!
translation.zh: 这是奶奶的玩具屋

translation.en: -[Val] It is beautiful. -Is it okay?
translation.zh: -太美了-可以吗？

translation.en: -[Val] You did it! -[Dora gasps] Good job, Mom and Dad!
translation.zh: -你做到了-干得好 爸爸妈妈！

translation.en: [in Spanish] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Grant in English] They even put Christmas lights on it.
translation.zh: 他们甚至在上面放了圣诞灯

translation.en: -It's cultural. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 这是文化

translation.en: It better be.
translation.zh: 最好是

translation.en: [laughs] It's amazing.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Totally and completely amazing.
translation.zh: 非常让人惊艳

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Jackie] Charlotte! We have another situation.
translation.zh: 夏洛特！又有麻烦了

translation.en: We found your fake Santa letterhead, Mom. And so… we started an investigation.
translation.zh: 我们找到你的假圣诞信纸 妈妈所以我们开始调查

translation.en: Grant still believes in "Santa."
translation.zh: 格兰特仍然相信“圣诞老人”

translation.en: -But I have my doubts. -Where did he go?
translation.zh: -但我有疑虑-他去哪里了？

translation.en: He checked your phone and thinks that "Santa" didn't get your text.
translation.zh: 他查了你的手机认为“圣诞老人”没收到你的短信

translation.en: So he decided to prove that "Santa" is real
translation.zh: 所以他决定证明“圣诞老人”是真的

translation.en: and go back to where "Santa" would be expecting him.
translation.zh: 并回到“圣诞老人”认为他所在的地方

translation.en: Home?
translation.zh: 回家吗？

translation.en: Grant? Grant? Grant?
translation.zh: 格兰特？

translation.en: Shepherds haven't seen him. I'm gonna ask Santa and the elves.
translation.zh: 牧羊人没见过他我去问问圣诞老人和小精灵们

translation.en: I'll check the bus station.
translation.zh: 我去公交车站看一看

translation.en: Just in case.
translation.zh: 以防万一

translation.en: -Come here and tell Santa-- -Excuse me. Sorry.
translation.zh: -来告诉圣诞老人-对不起

translation.en: -Santa, have you seen this boy? -Ah! Not today, thank goodness.
translation.zh: -先生 请问有没有看到这个小孩？-今天没有 谢天谢地

translation.en: Not-- He-- Not at all?
translation.zh: 没有 完全没有吗？

translation.en: -A couple of days ago, but not today. -Okay. Thank you. Sorry. Thank you.
translation.zh: -几天前见过 但今天没有-好 谢谢 对不起 谢谢

translation.en: [man] Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Listen. I called the police chief. He's got his people out looking, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 我给警察局长打了电话他派人去找了 好吗？

translation.en: I promise you, okay? This kid is a ninja. He--
translation.zh: 我答应你 好吗？这孩子是忍者

translation.en: -Oh my God. -What?
translation.zh: -天呐-什么？

translation.en: [Jackie] He's a ninja warrior. Jackie knows.
translation.zh: 他是忍者战士 洁姬知道他在哪了

translation.en: -Trust me. Jackie knows. -Okay.
translation.zh: -相信我 洁姬知道-好吧

translation.en: -Where should we go? -Straight.
translation.zh: -我们该去哪里？-直走

translation.en: Char, listen. You got this. I'm gonna see you at home.
translation.zh: 小夏 听着 你能行 我们家里见

translation.en: -Love you. -Love you.
translation.zh: -爱你-爱你

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi. Um, that's my son.
translation.zh: -你好-你好 那是我儿子

translation.en: -How long has he been here? -Not long. We gave him miso.
translation.zh: -他在这里多久了？-没多久 我们给了他味噌汤

translation.en: [laughs] Oh gosh.
translation.zh: 天呐

translation.en: Oh, it's our pleasure.
translation.zh: 这是我们的荣幸

translation.en: It's not very often that we get a real ninja in our restaurant.
translation.zh: 我们餐厅很少见到真正的忍者

translation.en: That's so sweet. Thank you.
translation.zh: 太贴心了 谢谢

translation.en: -Mom? -Monkey Bob was hungry?
translation.zh: -妈妈？-猴子鲍勃饿了吗？

translation.en: Starved.
translation.zh: 饿死了

translation.en: Honey, Santa got your message. It's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 圣诞老人收到你的信息了不会有事的

translation.en: Santa's real, isn't he, Mom?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人是真的 对吧 妈妈？

translation.en: -Well, what do you think? -I wanna believe, but I need proof.
translation.zh: -你觉得呢？-我想相信 但我需要证据

translation.en: Well, he gives you presents on Christmas morning.
translation.zh: 他在圣诞节早上送你礼物

translation.en: Beatrix says that's not enough proof. Our parents can give us gifts.
translation.zh: 碧翠丝说这还不够父母也可以给我们礼物

translation.en: She says we need real evidence, like a lock of hair for DNA testing.
translation.zh: 她说我们需要真正的证据比如拿一缕头发去做DNA检测

translation.en: Do you believe in him?
translation.zh: 你相信他吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -Did you ever see him?
translation.zh: -相信-你见过他吗？

translation.en: You know, I usually fell asleep before he came.
translation.zh: 我通常在他来之前就睡着了

translation.en: -But I always keep looking and hoping. -Really?
translation.zh: -但我一直在在寻找和抱有希望-真的吗？

translation.en: Pinky swear?
translation.zh: 拉钩？

translation.en: [man] Can we turn on the news?
translation.zh: 我们能听新闻吗？

translation.en: Okay. Let's go. [reporter on TV] Breaking story next on Channel 6 News.
translation.zh: -好 走吧-接下来50频道将播报突发新闻

translation.en: Michelle is our tech reporter who's been following this breaking news.
translation.zh: 米歇尔是我们的科技记者她一直在跟进这则突发新闻

translation.en: -Michelle, what can you tell us? -Thank you, Jim.
translation.zh: -你能告诉我们什么？-谢谢你 吉姆

translation.en: Following the viral video "Vacuum of Death,"
translation.zh: 星际科技公司的人气机器人吸尘器着火

translation.en: which showed StarTech's popular robovac bursting into flames,
translation.zh: 继这则视频《死亡吸尘器》爆红后

translation.en: federal investigators learned the company went ahead and shipped the units
translation.zh: 调查人员了解到尽管有致命缺点公司依旧产品运送了出去

translation.en: -despite serious design flaws… -I warned them!
translation.zh: 我警告过他们

translation.en: The feds have frozen the company's assets as they now face crippling lawsuits
translation.zh: 联邦调查局冻结了公司的资产他们现在面临法律诉讼

translation.en: that could likely force them into Chapter 11.
translation.zh: 很可能被迫宣布破产

translation.en: Translation, it's going to be a blue Christmas for StarTech employees.
translation.zh: 换句话说 对星际科技的员工而言这是个蓝色的圣诞节

translation.en: Something terrible happened. StarTech just imploded.
translation.zh: 发生了可怕的事 星际科技爆炸了

translation.en: -It's all over the news. -What? Oh no.
translation.zh: -新闻上到处都是-什么？不会吧

translation.en: -Seriously? -Yeah. Rob has no idea.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-对 罗伯还不知道

translation.en: I just sunk our entire emergency fund into this house that Rob loves.
translation.zh: 我把我们所有的应急资金都投到了鲍勃喜欢的那个房子里

translation.en: That's it. No more money. And now I'm losing my job for sure.
translation.zh: 完蛋了 我们没钱了而且现在我肯定会丢掉工作

translation.en: -It's impeccable timing. -Oh my God, Charlotte. I am so sorry.
translation.zh: -这个时机真是太差了-天啊 夏洛特 我非常抱歉

translation.en: Really, I am.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: I knew something like this would happen. It always does.
translation.zh: 我就知道会发生这种事人生总是这样

translation.en: So the real estate office in Salt Lake is open till five.
translation.zh: 盐湖城的地产办公室营业到五点

translation.en: They need an original signature to revoke the deal.
translation.zh: 他们需要本人签名才能撤销交易

translation.en: -And if I leave now, I can just make it. -But you can't leave.
translation.zh: -如果我现在走 刚好能赶上-但你不能走

translation.en: It's Christmas Eve, and you'll miss the pageant.
translation.zh: 今天是平安夜 你会错过表演的

translation.en: Well, I have no other choice. I'm just facing reality.
translation.zh: 我别无选择 这只是面对现实

translation.en: Oh no, you always have a choice.
translation.zh: 不 你总有其他选择

translation.en: I appreciate your positivity,
translation.zh: 谢谢你的积极态度

translation.en: but things just don't magically work out for all of us.
translation.zh: 但我们的人生不会都奇迹般一帆风顺

translation.en: Things don't just magically work out for me either.
translation.zh: 我的人生也并不是都奇迹般一帆风顺

translation.en: Oh, come on, Jackie. You have it all. Like, you have the house.
translation.zh: 拜托 洁姬 你拥有一切 大房子

translation.en: You have Mr. Genius Fitness Model. Your kids are amazing.
translation.zh: 你有天才健身模特先生你的孩子无与伦比

translation.en: One is super smart, and one is out saving the world.
translation.zh: 一个超级聪明 一个在拯救世界

translation.en: [voice breaking] Saving the world?
translation.zh: 拯救世界？

translation.en: Oh, Char.
translation.zh: 小夏

translation.en: And I don't say it with envy. I think it's wonderful. You deserve it.
translation.zh: 而且我没有嫉妒 我觉得很棒 你值得

translation.en: [sniffs] It's just some girls have it, and some girls don't.
translation.zh: 只是有的女孩能拥有一切有的女孩则不能

translation.en: But I'll be back later tonight, and I'll meet you all at the pageant.
translation.zh: 不过我今晚会回来 表演会见

translation.en: -[Rob] Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿-嘿

translation.en: -[Rob] How's he doing? -He's fine.
translation.zh: -他怎么样了？-他没事

translation.en: [Rob] Good. Where are you off to?
translation.zh: 很好 你要去哪里？

translation.en: -Uh, it's a long story. -Is this about StarTech?
translation.zh: -说来话长-是关于星际科技的吗？

translation.en: -You heard? -It's all over the Internet.
translation.zh: -你听说了吗？-网上到处都是

translation.en: Well, all that time I put in, and it's gone, just like that.
translation.zh: 我花了那么多时间 都打水漂了

translation.en: Congratulations.
translation.zh: 恭喜你

translation.en: Congratulations?
translation.zh: 祝贺？

translation.en: StarTech was always a placeholder. Remember? You always promised yourself--
translation.zh: 星际科技一直只是个占位符记得吗？你总是答应自己

translation.en: It was a placeholder that helped pay for the food and the rent.
translation.zh: 那是个能买食物付房租的占位符

translation.en: But never inspired.
translation.zh: 但从来没激励过你

translation.en: Look, we're… we're gonna figure things out. Look on the bright side. You were right.
translation.zh: 听着 我们能找到方法应对往好的方面看 而且你说得对

translation.en: I was? About what?
translation.zh: 真的吗 关于什么？

translation.en: You warned me not to buy the house.
translation.zh: 你警告过我不要买房子

translation.en: That was smart. [exhales]
translation.zh: 这确实明智

translation.en: I'm sorry, honey.
translation.zh: 对不起 亲爱的

translation.en: -For what? -It wasn't supposed to be like this.
translation.zh: -为什么？-事情本不该是这的

translation.en: I mean, I was the one with all the potential.
translation.zh: 我是那个充满潜力的人

translation.en: -And now look at me. -Look at you?
translation.zh: -但看看现在的我-看看你？

translation.en: Look at-- Honey, listen, I… I… I get that this is not great news.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 听着 我知道这不是好消息

translation.en: But I have faith. Everything is gonna work out.
translation.zh: 但我有信心 一切都会好起来

translation.en: Yeah, but, I mean… things don't really work out.
translation.zh: 但其实很多事无法实现

translation.en: -They don't actually work out. -[Rob sighs]
translation.zh: 也不会好起来

translation.en: And every year I'm reminded,
translation.zh: 每年我会想起

translation.en: on an annual basis, of everything I wanted to do for you, for us.
translation.zh: 每年都是 我想为你 为我们做的一切

translation.en: And it's punctuated by this "exclamation point" called Christmas.
translation.zh: 最后还有一个“感叹号”叫做圣诞节

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: -Where are you going? -To try a reverse swan dive.
translation.zh: -你要去哪里？-试着取消一个飞蛾扑火

translation.en: [DJ] That was "Just Cancel Christmas." And in financial news,
translation.zh: 刚才的是《取消圣诞节》接下去播报财经新闻

translation.en: StarTech takes a dive just in time for the hol--
translation.zh: 星际科技在节日前刚宣布破产

translation.en: -[yelps] You scared the-- -[tires squealing]
translation.zh: 你吓到

translation.en: Does this mean I'm dead?
translation.zh: 这意味我死了吗？

translation.en: -Miss, are you okay? -Rose. Rose. Rose!
translation.zh: -女士 你没事吧？-露丝？

translation.en: [exclaims] I'm so glad you're not real!
translation.zh: 我很高兴你不是真的天使

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm just heading into town to get ready for the show.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我正要进城为节目做准备

translation.en: -Okay. -You're Jackie's friend, right?
translation.zh: -好的-你是洁姬的朋友 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah, I just, um… I was driving, and I hit a patch of ice, I…
translation.zh: 对 我开车时撞到了一块冰

translation.en: We're all real happy you're spending time with Jackie.
translation.zh: 我们很开心你能和洁姬在一起

translation.en: She loves company, especially around this time of year.
translation.zh: 她喜欢有人陪伴尤其是每年这个时候

translation.en: I'm parked right over there. I'll wait while you get back on the road.
translation.zh: 我就停在那里 我等你重新回到路上

translation.en: You're gonna be all right. You drive safe now.
translation.zh: 你会没事的 开车注意安全

translation.en: -[Val] You guys wanna see Santa? -[screaming] Yes!
translation.zh: 你们想看圣诞老人吗？ -想-看情况吧

translation.en: -[Beatrix] We'll see. -[Jackie] Oh my goodness! Get excited!
translation.zh: -想-看情况吧 天啊 兴奋点

translation.en: -[Val] You will see! -[Rob] Okay, come on, ninja man.
translation.zh: 天啊 兴奋点 好了 来吧 忍者我们不想让瓦尔的表演迟到

translation.en: We don't wanna make Val late for his performance.
translation.zh: 好了 来吧 忍者我们不想让瓦尔的表演迟到

translation.en: But I need to find Bob!
translation.zh: 但我得找到鲍勃

translation.en: Well, I'm sure he'll turn up. You know how he likes to hide.
translation.zh: 我相信他会出现的你知道他喜欢躲起来

translation.en: Oh yeah. He does. Good thinking, Dad.
translation.zh: 对 没错 说得对 爸爸

translation.en: -The star will be there? -The star will be there. Okay? Promise.
translation.zh: -星星会在那里吗？-星星会在的 我保证

translation.en: [Rose] We're all real happy you're spending time with Jackie.
translation.zh: 我们很开心你能和洁姬在一起

translation.en: She loves company, especially around this time of year.
translation.zh: 她喜欢有人陪伴尤其是每年这个时候

translation.en: [Jackie] You know, Daniel wanted to be an inventor. Always hoping to change the world.
translation.zh: 丹尼尔一直想成为发明家希望能改变世界

translation.en: I wish he was here.
translation.zh: 真希望他在这里

translation.en: Oh no.
translation.zh: 不会吧

translation.en: That's not something you just… put in the holiday newsletter.
translation.zh: 这不适合写进假日简报里

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: When what happened happened,
translation.zh: 他去世时

translation.en: it took such an unbelievable toll on our family.
translation.zh: 我们全家人都受到沉重打击

translation.en: I didn't send out a newsletter that year because, well…
translation.zh: 那年我没发假日简报 因为…

translation.en: But then I realized that we needed to create something.
translation.zh: 但之后我意识到我们需要创造些什么

translation.en: You know, to keep his memory alive.
translation.zh: 把他留在记忆中

translation.en: So… we started a foundation in his name.
translation.zh: 所以我们以他的名义成立了一个基金会

translation.en: And I wrote about it in the newsletter like he did it all.
translation.zh: 我在节日简报写了这件事仿佛就是他做的

translation.en: 'Cause…
translation.zh: 因为

translation.en: in a way, he did.
translation.zh: 从某种程度上来说 确实是他做的

translation.en: I wanna show you something. But you have to dress warm. Okay?
translation.zh: 我想给你看样东西但你得穿得暖和一点 好吗？

translation.en: -[sniffles] Okay. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好-好

translation.en: This was Daniel's biggest dream.
translation.zh: 这是丹尼尔最大的梦想

translation.en: It's real.
translation.zh: 是真的

translation.en: You're looking at the first completely solar-powered hot-air balloon.
translation.zh: 这是首个完全由太阳能驱动的热气球

translation.en: Around the World in 80 Days was Danny's all-time favorite bedtime story.
translation.zh: 《80天环游世界》是丹尼最喜欢的睡前故事

translation.en: We read it nearly every night.
translation.zh: 我们每晚都读

translation.en: At home.
translation.zh: 无论是在家

translation.en: In the hospital.
translation.zh: 还是在医院

translation.en: Oh, I, I… I promised him that someday I would build us a balloon to take us around the world.
translation.zh: 我答应过他有一天我会造个热气球带家人一起环游世界

translation.en: And it had to be environmentally friendly, because that was a big thing to him, so…
translation.zh: 但必须是环保的因为这对他来说很重要

translation.en: So I made it solar-powered. -[Charlotte laughs] -[chuckles] It's crazy, huh?
translation.zh: 所以我做成了太阳能的 很疯狂吧？

translation.en: No. No, it's not crazy.
translation.zh: 不 这不疯狂

translation.en: And the balloon is going to be the Star of Bethlehem.
translation.zh: 这个热气球将成为伯利恒之星

translation.en: It's our way of making sure that Daniel's part of Christmas this year.
translation.zh: 这是我们让丹尼尔能参加今年圣诞节的方式

translation.en: This is what I saw in the sky!
translation.zh: 这是我在天上看到的

translation.en: -The star lights up! -[laughs] Yeah.
translation.zh: -星星亮了-对

translation.en: Wait, yes. Rose has been helping me.
translation.zh: 等等 是的 萝丝一直在帮我

translation.en: She did a… a test run the night you guys arrived.
translation.zh: 你们来的那天晚上 她做了测试

translation.en: -[Jackie] Monkey Bob. -[both laughing]
translation.zh: 猴子鲍勃

translation.en: -[kids] Dad, can we get an apple? -Yeah, there's one up there.
translation.zh: -爸爸 我们能拿个苹果吗？-可以 那边有

translation.en: There's apples up there. Go ahead. One each.
translation.zh: 那边有苹果 去吧 一人一个

translation.en: -[Grant] Oh my God! -[Dora] Sprinkles!
translation.zh: -天呐！-糖碎！

translation.en: [Beatrix] Can I get M&M?
translation.zh: 我可以买M&M巧克力豆吗？

translation.en: -Thank you. -[Rob] What'd you get? Sprinkles?
translation.zh: -谢谢-你拿了什么 糖碎吗？

translation.en: [Dora] Sprinkles!
translation.zh: 糖碎

translation.en: -Daddy, you get one. -[Rob] Should I get one?
translation.zh: -爸爸 你拿一个-我该拿吗？

translation.en: -You're gonna give me a bite, right? -[Dora] No, I'm not.
translation.zh: -你会让我吃一口的 对吧？-不 我不会

translation.en: -[beeps] -Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: -Yeah. -[uplifting music playing]
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Okay, Char.
translation.zh: 好的 小夏

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Bye, Monkey Bob. -Bye! Have fun.
translation.zh: -再见 猴子鲍勃-再见 玩得开心

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Godspeed.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: -[power surging] -[Jackie] What?
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: -[alarm ringing] -What's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: -No, no, no. -[ringing continues]
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: The solar batteries are fully charged. Something's wrong with the control panel.
translation.zh: 太阳能电池已充满电但控制面板出了点问题

translation.en: Charlotte.
translation.zh: 夏洛特

translation.en: -Are you okay? -No!
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-不

translation.en: I mean, we've had sporadic electrical issues during our test flights.
translation.zh: 我们试飞时偶尔会出现电力问题

translation.en: -But I thought it was all sorted out. -Well, sounds like you need an engineer.
translation.zh: -但我以为一切都解决了-听起来你需要一个工程师

translation.en: [exclaims] Yes!
translation.zh: 对 没错

translation.en: [Charlotte] I can figure this out.
translation.zh: 我能解决

translation.en: [Grant] Any sign of Santa?
translation.zh: 有圣诞老人的踪迹吗？

translation.en: Okay. That should do it.
translation.zh: 好 应该可以了

translation.en: -Just keep those on to be safe. -I thought these were for eating chips.
translation.zh: -为了安全起见 还是戴上吧-我以为这些是吃薯片用的

translation.en: They are, but they're also gonna help us fly this baby.
translation.zh: 是的 但也能帮我们开这个家伙

translation.en: They are?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: It's the same reason the Vacuum of Death caught fire.
translation.zh: 这和死亡吸尘器着火的原因一样

translation.en: Electrostatic discharge. They channel the electron buildup from the dry air,
translation.zh: 静电放电它们能收集干燥空气中的电子

translation.en: and they stop the system from shorting out.
translation.zh: 防止系统短路

translation.en: -Trust me. [laughing] -Okay.
translation.zh: -相信我-好的

translation.en: It worked!
translation.zh: 成功了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: See you at the pageant.
translation.zh: 表演会见

translation.en: Care for a lift?
translation.zh: 想搭个便车吗？

translation.en: You got room for three? Me and this creepy monkey?
translation.zh: 能坐下三个人吗？我和这只吓人的猴子？

translation.en: [laughs] You're so funny.
translation.zh: 你真有趣

translation.en: There you go.
translation.zh: 上来吧

translation.en: Careful.
translation.zh: 小心

translation.en: [Charlotte] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Thank God Monkey Bob convinced Grant to put our address in your GPS.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 猴子鲍勃说服了格兰特在你的GPS里输入我们家的地址

translation.en: You saved my Christmas, Char.
translation.zh: 你救了我的圣诞节 小夏

translation.en: Aw! You saved my Christmas.
translation.zh: 你救了我的圣诞节

translation.en: Oh, and for the record,
translation.zh: 对了

translation.en: I still don't understand why these things never took off.
translation.zh: 我还不懂为什么热气球没有火起来

translation.en: It's a marketing no-brainer.
translation.zh: 这是营销的大好方式

translation.en: You slap a sports team logo right here, and, mmm!
translation.zh: 在上面贴一个运动队的标志

translation.en: -And what? -It's called branding, girl! Hello?
translation.zh: -然后呢？-这叫推广品牌 你不知道吗？

translation.en: People love that stuff.
translation.zh: 人们喜欢那种东西 你能赚大钱

translation.en: -You'd make a fortune. [squeals] -Okay!
translation.zh: 人们喜欢那种东西 你能赚大钱 好

translation.en: [Jackie] Look, it's our house.
translation.zh: 看 这是我们家

translation.en: Wait, we forgot to pull the ladder up! Gonna grab it.
translation.zh: 等等 我们忘了把梯子拉上去我要抓住它

translation.en: [Jackie] Oh my God.
translation.zh: 这下糟了

translation.en: We're losing altitude. It's the weight of the sleigh.
translation.zh: 我们正在下降 是雪橇太重了

translation.en: Oh my God. I think we should land.
translation.zh: -天啊-我想我们该降落了

translation.en: [Grant] I wanna believe, but I need proof.
translation.zh: 我想相信 但我需要证据

translation.en: -[Charlotte] Well… -We should land.
translation.zh: -这个嘛-我们该着陆了

translation.en: -Monkey Bob has an idea. -Monkey Bob?
translation.zh: -猴子鲍勃有个主意-猴子鲍勃？

translation.en: Yeah. I'm gonna increase the fan speed.
translation.zh: 对 我要提高风扇速度

translation.en: -[Jackie] Wait, what? Why? -We're not landing.
translation.zh: -等等 什么 为什么？-我们不能降落

translation.en: Not yet.
translation.zh: 还不行

translation.en: Char, we can't fly over the town square
translation.zh: 小夏 我们不能挂着一个

translation.en: with a sled hanging off of us and no Santa!
translation.zh: 没有圣诞老人的雪橇飞过镇子

translation.en: [Charlotte] You're right.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: Wait. [grunting]
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: What the heck are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: Believing.
translation.zh: 相信

translation.en: Oh my God. Be careful.
translation.zh: 天啊 小心点

translation.en: [Charlotte] You got this. [nervously] You got this.
translation.zh: 你能行

translation.en: I don't think she's got this.
translation.zh: 我觉得她不行

translation.en: -[yelping] -[yelping] Charlotte!
translation.zh: 夏洛特！

translation.en: [Charlotte] I'm okay! [nervously] I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm okay.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: Char, just let me land.
translation.zh: 小夏 让我降落吧

translation.en: No, no, no! Steady the course.
translation.zh: 不 继续前进

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: And fly straight out over the audience.
translation.zh: 直接飞到观众席上

translation.en: Santa Claus is coming to town.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人要来咯

translation.en: -[soft music playing] -[indistinct chatter]
translation.zh: 田野里的牧羊人

translation.en: [sighs] I think it's time to conclude our investigation.
translation.zh: 我觉得调查该结束了

translation.en: We need more time, Bea.
translation.zh: 我们需要更多时间 碧

translation.en: You wanna believe, don't you?
translation.zh: 你想相信 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah, Grant. I do, but I am me.
translation.zh: 对 格兰特 我想 但我就是我

translation.en: Oh my gosh.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -Bea! -[Beatrix] What?
translation.zh: -碧-什么？

translation.en: [Grant] It's… -[exclaims] -[Grant] It's…
translation.zh: 那是

translation.en: -OMG! -[crowd clamoring]
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: -Santa Claus! -[clamoring continues]
translation.zh: 圣诞老人！

translation.en: [in deep voice] Merry Christmas to all!
translation.zh: 祝大家圣诞快乐！

translation.en: [Dora] It's Santa!
translation.zh: 是圣诞老人来了

translation.en: [in deep voice] Is Grant Sanders down there?
translation.zh: 格兰特·桑德斯在下面吗？

translation.en: That's me! That's me!
translation.zh: 是我！

translation.en: Monkey Bob is flying!
translation.zh: 猴子鲍勃在飞！

translation.en: [in deep voice] Merry Christmas to all, and to all a good night!
translation.zh: 祝大家圣诞快乐 祝大家晚安！

translation.en: [Jackie] Let's get you on the ground, Santa.
translation.zh: 我们放你下去吧 圣诞老人

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Okay, quick, unhook the sleigh.
translation.zh: 好 快点 解开雪橇

translation.en: -It's caught. -Oh.
translation.zh: 缠住了

translation.en: Here, let me help.
translation.zh: 我来帮忙吧

translation.en: [Charlotte] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I know how tricky these flying sleighs can be.
translation.zh: 我知道这些飞行雪橇有多容易缠住

translation.en: [Charlotte] Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: You're good to go.
translation.zh: 你可以走了

translation.en: -Thank you for your hel-- -No, thank you, Charlotte Sanders.
translation.zh: -谢谢你的帮助-不 谢谢你 夏洛特·桑德斯

translation.en: You're welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: Wait! How do you know my name?
translation.zh: 等等 你怎么知道我的名字？

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Danny.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 丹尼

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Danny.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 丹尼

translation.en: [on mic] I have an urgent message to all the kids out there.
translation.zh: 我有一条紧急信息要告诉所有的孩子

translation.en: New evidence has emerged in my investigation of Santa.
translation.zh: 我对圣诞老人的调查出现了新证据

translation.en: My advice to you is believe,
translation.zh: 我给你的建议是相信

translation.en: 'cause he still believes in you.
translation.zh: 因为他依然相信你

translation.en: Now, who's ready to help me make this the best Christmas ever?
translation.zh: 谁愿意帮我把这个圣诞节变成最棒的圣诞节？

translation.en: Season's greetings from the Sanders family with the Jennings family as well.
translation.zh: 桑德斯家族和詹宁斯家族的节日问候

translation.en: It's sort of become our new tradition.
translation.zh: 这已经成为我们的新传统了

translation.en: We finally made it to my sister's house just in time for New Year's Eve.
translation.zh: 我们终于在新年前夜赶到我姐姐家

translation.en: Jackie and I started our own Chip Mitt business.
translation.zh: 洁姬和我开始做薯片手套生意

translation.en: And our first client was Mariah Carey.
translation.zh: 我们的第一个客户是玛丽亚·凯莉

translation.en: "No more cookie crumbs."
translation.zh: 再也没有饼干屑

translation.en: In their quest to become superheroes,
translation.zh: 在成为超级英雄的征程里

translation.en: all our kids are taking karate lessons from Valentino.
translation.zh: 我们的孩子都去瓦伦蒂诺那里学习空手道

translation.en: The Jennings family dream finally came true
translation.zh: 詹宁斯一家的的梦想终于成真

translation.en: when they floated around the world raising money for Daniel's charity.
translation.zh: 他们坐热气球环游世界为丹尼尔的基金筹钱

translation.en: And our dream also came true. We got the house!
translation.zh: 我们的梦想也成真了我们买下了房子

translation.en: But guess what? We're keeping it for our splendiferous family.
translation.zh: 但你猜怎么着？我们要留下给我们美好顺遂的家庭

translation.en: What can I say?
translation.zh: 我能说什么呢？

translation.en: Christmas with Jackie is a life-altering experience.
translation.zh: 和洁姬一起过圣诞节是场改变人生的经历
